analysis.description:
VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#627-666) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)

VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#627-666) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#733-739) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0

VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#627-666) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#733-739) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0
VestingTrustee.vestedTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#690-700) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- grant.value == 0

Reentrancy in VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#627-666):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalVesting.add(_value) <= blok.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#651-652)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- grants (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#653-660)
	- totalVesting (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#665)

Reentrancy in BlokTokenSale.grantTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#499-530):
	External calls:
	- issueTokens(grantee,tokensIssued) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#515-519)
	- issueTokens(trustee,tokensVesting) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#522)
	- trustee.grant(grantee,tokensVesting,now.add(tokenGrant.startOffset),now.add(tokenGrant.cliffOffset),now.add(tokenGrant.endOffset),tokenGrant.installmentLength,true) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#523-529)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastGrantedIndex (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#530)

BasicToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#17-18) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#4-5)

VestingTrustee.revoke (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#672-686) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-blok.transfer(msg.sender,refund) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#685)

VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#733-739) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-blok.transfer(msg.sender,transferable) (/unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol)

VestingTrustee.revoke.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#672-673) shadows:
	- VestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#627-666)

VestingTrustee.vestedTokens.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#695) shadows:

VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens.grant (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#733-734) shadows:
	- VestingTrustee.grant (function @ /unique_chucks/11/0x8426d0dc03335d4a391bf4cf7fe546ff89549de4.sol#627-666)
